019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
024import io.kubernetes.client.util.Watch;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
031import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
032import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8s;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sClient;
035import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicModel;
036import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicModels;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicStub;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sObserver.ResponseType;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinitionStub;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmPool;
041import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM_POOL;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.GetPools;
043import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
044import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmPoolChanged;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
046import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
047import org.jgrapes.core.EventPipeline;
048import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
049import org.jgrapes.core.events.Attached;
050
051/**
052 * Watches for changes of VM pools. Reports the changes using 
053 * {@link VmPoolChanged} events fired on a special pipeline to
054 * avoid concurrent change informations.
055 */
056@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.ExcessiveImports" })
057public class PoolMonitor extends
058        AbstractMonitor<K8sDynamicModel, K8sDynamicModels, Channel> {
059
060    private final Map<String, VmPool> pools = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
061    private EventPipeline poolPipeline;
062
063    /**
064     * Instantiates a new VM pool manager.
065     *
066     * @param componentChannel the component channel
067     * @param channelManager the channel manager
068     */
069    public PoolMonitor(Channel componentChannel) {
070        super(componentChannel, K8sDynamicModel.class,
071            K8sDynamicModels.class);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * On attached.
076     *
077     * @param event the event
078     */
079    @Handler
080    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CompareObjectsWithEquals")
081    public void onAttached(Attached event) {
082        if (event.node() == this) {
083            poolPipeline = newEventPipeline();
084        }
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    protected void prepareMonitoring() throws IOException, ApiException {
089        client(new K8sClient());
090
091        // Get all our API versions
092        var ctx = K8s.context(client(), VM_OP_GROUP, "", VM_OP_KIND_VM_POOL);
093        if (ctx.isEmpty()) {
094            logger.severe(() -> "Cannot get CRD context.");
095            return;
096        }
097        context(ctx.get());
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    protected void handleChange(K8sClient client,
102            Watch.Response<K8sDynamicModel> response) {
103
104        var type = ResponseType.valueOf(response.type);
105        var poolName = response.object.metadata().getName();
106
107        // When pool is deleted, save VMs in pending
108        if (type == ResponseType.DELETED) {
109            Optional.ofNullable(pools.get(poolName)).ifPresent(pool -> {
110                pool.setDefined(false);
111                if (pool.vms().isEmpty()) {
112                    pools.remove(poolName);
113                }
114                poolPipeline.fire(new VmPoolChanged(pool, true));
115            });
116            return;
117        }
118
119        // Get full definition
120        var poolModel = response.object;
121        if (poolModel.data() == null) {
122            // ADDED event does not provide data, see
123            // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/3215
124            try {
125                poolModel = K8sDynamicStub.get(client(), context(), namespace(),
126                    poolModel.metadata().getName()).model().orElse(null);
127            } catch (ApiException e) {
128                return;
129            }
130        }
131
132        // Get pool and merge changes
133        var vmPool = pools.computeIfAbsent(poolName, k -> new VmPool(poolName));
134        var newData = client().getJSON().getGson().fromJson(
135            GsonPtr.to(poolModel.data()).to("spec").get(), VmPool.class);
136        vmPool.setRetention(newData.retention());
137        vmPool.setPermissions(newData.permissions());
138        vmPool.setDefined(true);
139        poolPipeline.fire(new VmPoolChanged(vmPool));
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Track VM definition changes.
144     *
145     * @param event the event
146     * @throws ApiException 
147     */
148    @Handler
149    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event) throws ApiException {
150        final var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
151        final String vmName = vmDef.name();
152        switch (event.type()) {
153        case ADDED:
154            vmDef.<List<String>> fromSpec("pools")
155                .orElse(Collections.emptyList()).stream().forEach(p -> {
156                    pools.computeIfAbsent(p, k -> new VmPool(p))
157                        .vms().add(vmName);
158                    poolPipeline.fire(new VmPoolChanged(pools.get(p)));
159                });
160            break;
161        case DELETED:
162            pools.values().stream().forEach(p -> {
163                if (p.vms().remove(vmName)) {
164                    poolPipeline.fire(new VmPoolChanged(p));
165                }
166            });
167            return;
168        default:
169            break;
170        }
171
172        // Sync last usage to console state change if user matches
173        if (vmDef.assignedTo()
174            .map(at -> at.equals(vmDef.consoleUser().orElse(null)))
175            .orElse(true)) {
176            return;
177        }
178
179        var ccChange = vmDef.condition("ConsoleConnected")
180            .map(cc -> cc.getLastTransitionTime().toInstant());
181        if (ccChange
182            .map(tt -> vmDef.assignmentLastUsed().map(alu -> alu.isAfter(tt))
183                .orElse(true))
184            .orElse(true)) {
185            return;
186        }
187        var vmStub = VmDefinitionStub.get(client(),
188            new GroupVersionKind(VM_OP_GROUP, "", VM_OP_KIND_VM),
189            vmDef.namespace(), vmDef.name());
190        vmStub.updateStatus(from -> {
191            JsonObject status = from.status();
192            var assignment = GsonPtr.to(status).to("assignment");
193            assignment.set("lastUsed", ccChange.get().toString());
194            return status;
195        });
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * Return the requested pools.
200     *
201     * @param event the event
202     */
203    @Handler
204    public void onGetPools(GetPools event) {
205        event.setResult(pools.values().stream().filter(VmPool::isDefined)
206            .filter(p -> event.name().isEmpty()
207                || p.name().equals(event.name().get()))
208            .filter(p -> event.forUser().isEmpty() && event.forRoles().isEmpty()
209                || !p.permissionsFor(event.forUser().orElse(null),
210                    event.forRoles()).isEmpty())
211            .toList());
212    }
213}
